allow: Bash(python -c "import sys,json; data=json.load\(sys.stdin\); [print\(x[''path'']\) for x in data.get\(''tree'',[]\) if any\(k in x[''path''].lower\(\) for k in [''profile'',''bio'',''memory'',''diary'',''character'',''prompt'']\)]")
